author: gdaniels
msg: Get service-specific type mappings working with WSDD.
Added a <beanMapping> tag to WSDD, which is just like a <typeMapping>
except you don't need the serializer/deserializer attributes.
Fix a bug in SerializationContext that was unnecessarily incrementing the
